general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Irrigate the crop. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage. Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss. Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings during the daytime. In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30Â°C.

advisory: Water deficit should be avoided during critical stages.
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect from water scarcity.
Irrigate the crop and prevent stagnant water.
Apply 1g Streptocyclin in root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps and spray neem-based pesticide for management.
Mulch coconut leaves around the tree.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during daytime.
Harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises.
Check migration of caterpillars and use appropriate insecticides.
Check migration of caterpillars and use appropriate insecticides.
Treat seeds with Imidacloprid to prevent whitefly infestation.
Cut tops after harvesting and store dried bulbs.
Spray insecticides to control mango hoppers.
